title: Remembering When Johnny Cash Stopped To Talk To A Young Reporter
teaser: In 1981, NPR's Don Gonyea's was working as a disc jockey in Michigan when he got an interview with Johnny Cash at a county fair. (This piece first aired on Feb. 23, 2013 on Weekend Edition Saturday).
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
